'''''One Flew Over the Sick Men's Rest''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete the [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] ''[[Abbas' Escape]]''.
<!--
==Gameplay Notes==
-->
== Trivia ==
* The name of the achievement is a reference to {{w|Ken Kesey}}'s 1962 novel ''{{w|One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest (novel)|One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest}}''.
